title: Black FedEx driver allegedly shot at by White father and son says he sees similarities with Ahmaud Arbery case: 'I feel it's my responsibility to speak up' - CNN
content:
1. Black FedEx driver allegedly shot at by White father and son says he sees similarities with Ahmaud Arbery case: 'I feel it's my responsibility to speak up'  CNN
  2. Mississippi FedEx driver chased: Hate crime probe sought in attempted shooting; father, son charged  WLS-TV
  3. Hate crimes probe sought in attempted shooting  Associated Press
  4. White father and son charged for chasing and shooting at Black FedEx driver  CNN
  5. FedEx driver shot at  16 WAPT News Jackson
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A Black FedEx driver who says he was shot at by a White father and son while delivering packages in Mississippi "can definitely see the similarities" between his case and that of Ahmaud Arbery, the Black man who was chased and murdered in south Georgia.
